text: While it only took seeing this game's intro (still my favorite) to know I was in for something special, the funeral is when I truly fell in love with the game and especially the music. I still remember seeing the credits roll and thinking "wait, this is the end?", and then realizing that they were actually the opening credits after a slow but effective prologue. Naruke really made something special with this game, there's such a great level of emotions in her tracks. Simply on another level.
author: SupraDarky

text:
After Wild Arms 4 and 5, I did not expect Wild Arms 6, they totally change the gameplay and the focus on far west.
I would love if they return to pass those feelings of the first three games.
